Run this font_fix chunk 


```{r font_fix}
# Env. SetUp
# install.packages("ggthemes",repos = "http://cran.us.r-project.org")
# install.packages("extrafont", repos = "http://cran.us.r-project.org")
# 
# library(ggthemes)
# library(extrafont)

install.packages("Rttf2pt1", repos = "http://cran.us.r-project.org")
library(Rttf2pt1)

# Load fonts
extrafont::font_import()
# Load fonts
extrafont::loadfonts(quiet = T)
extrafont::fonts()

```
